code: import Axios from'axios';export default{fetchTutorial:function fetchTutorial(tutorialId){return Axios.get("/api/tutorials/".concat(tutorialId));},fetchSteps:function fetchSteps(tutorialId){return Axios.get("/api/tutorials/".concat(tutorialId,"/steps"));},deleteStep:function deleteStep(stepId){return Axios.delete("/api/steps/".concat(stepId));},fetchTutorials:function fetchTutorials(){return Axios.get('/api/tutorials/');},deleteTutorial:function deleteTutorial(tutorialId){return Axios.delete("/api/tutorials/".concat(tutorialId));},createStep:function createStep(tutorialID,newStep){return Axios.post("/api/tutorials/".concat(tutorialID,"/steps/create"),newStep);},createTutorial:function createTutorial(newTutorial){return Axios.post('/api/tutorials/create',newTutorial);}};
